trans-unit.source: Represents the grammar element that specifies a reference to a rule.
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento de gramática que especifica uma referência a uma regra.

trans-unit.source: The SrgsRuleRef class is particularly useful when you want to reuse an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> element whose contents have already been defined.
trans-unit.target: A classe SrgsRuleRef é particularmente útil quando você quiser reutilizar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>elemento cujo conteúdo já foi definido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: By reusing existing rules, you can build complex grammars more quickly.
trans-unit.target: Reutilizando regras existentes, você pode criar complexas gramáticas mais rapidamente.

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the constructors of the SrgsRuleRef class to reference an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object or a `rule` element if the following is true: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object is in the containing grammar and the value of its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> property is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um dos construtores da classe SrgsRuleRef para referenciar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto ou um `rule` elemento se o seguinte for verdadeiro:-o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto está na gramática contém e o valor de sua <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A>propriedade está <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleScope> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: - The `rule` element is in an external grammar and the value of its `scope` attribute is `public`.
trans-unit.target: -A `rule` elemento está em uma gramática externa e o valor de seu `scope` atributo é `public`.

trans-unit.source: - The `rule` element is in an external grammar, the value of its `scope` attribute is `private`, and it is declared as the `root rule` of the external grammar.
trans-unit.target: -A `rule` elemento está em uma gramática externa, o valor de seu `scope` atributo é `private`, e é declarada como o `root rule` da gramática externa.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `ruleref` element as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Essa classe representa o `ruleref` elemento, conforme definido no World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `ruleref` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [ruleref Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o SRGS `ruleref` elemento e detalhes sobre o suporte por Speech, consulte [ruleref elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class and specifies the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> classe e especifica a regra para referência.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma referência de regra a uma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto dentro de gramática contendo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma referência de regra a uma `rule` elemento em um arquivo de gramática externo, use qualquer um dos seguintes construtores:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de referência.

trans-unit.source: rule is .
trans-unit.target: ruleis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class and specifies the location of the external grammar file to reference.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> classe e especifica o local do arquivo de gramática externos para fazer referência.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma referência de regra para um arquivo de gramática externo.

trans-unit.source: The URI may also include the identifier of a rule to reference, for example `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml#targetRule`.
trans-unit.target: O URI também pode incluir o identificador de uma regra para fazer referência, por exemplo `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml#targetRule`.

trans-unit.source: If the `uri` parameter does not specify a rule identifier, the rule reference points to the root rule of the target grammar.
trans-unit.target: Se o `uri` parâmetro não especificar um identificador de regra, a referência de regra aponta para a regra raiz da gramática de destino.

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma referência de regra a um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>dentro da mesma gramática do objeto, use qualquer um dos seguintes construtores:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: O local de um arquivo de gramática fora a gramática contém.

trans-unit.source: uri is .
trans-unit.target: uriis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class, specifying the rule to reference and a string that contains a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> classe, especificando a regra para uma cadeia de caracteres que contém uma chave semântica e de referência.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma referência de regra a uma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto dentro de gramática contendo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The object to reference.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de referência.

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: A chave semântica.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> class, specifying the location of the external grammar file and the identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> classe, especificando o local do arquivo de gramática externo e o identificador da regra para referência.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a rule reference to a `rule` element in an external grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma referência de regra a um `rule` elemento em um arquivo de gramática externo.

trans-unit.source: To create a rule reference to an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object within the same grammar, use any of the following constructors: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: O local de um arquivo de gramática fora a gramática contém.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da regra para referência.

trans-unit.target: uriis .

trans-unit.source: The location of a grammar file outside the containing grammar.
trans-unit.target: O local de um arquivo de gramática fora a gramática contém.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da regra para referência.

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: A chave semântica.

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de inicialização para um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can match spoken input as defined by the dictation topic associated with this grammar.
trans-unit.target: Define uma regra que pode corresponder a entrada de fala, conforme definido pelo tópico ditado associado a esta gramática.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can match any speech up to the next rule match, the next token, or until the end of spoken input.
trans-unit.target: Define uma regra que pode corresponder a qualquer fala até a próxima correspondência de regra, o próximo token, ou até o final da entrada de fala.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that speech input can contain spelled-out letters of a word, and that spelled-out letters can be recognized as a word.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a entrada de fala pode conter letras de formas de uma palavra e letras que formas podem ser reconhecida como uma palavra.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that is automatically matched in the absence of any audio input.
trans-unit.target: Define uma regra que é correspondida automaticamente na ausência de qualquer entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the initialization parameters for a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de inicialização para um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The initialization parameters for a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de inicialização para um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets an alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres do alias para o dicionário de semântico.

trans-unit.source: An alias string for the semantic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres do alias para o dicionário de semântica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for the rule that this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"></xref> element references.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o URI para a regra que isso <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef"> </xref> referências de elemento.

trans-unit.source: The location of the rule to reference.
trans-unit.target: O local da regra para referência.

trans-unit.source: Defines a rule that can never be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Define uma regra que nunca pode ser dita.

trans-unit.source: Inserting VOID into a sequence automatically makes that sequence unspeakable.
trans-unit.target: Inserindo nulo em uma sequência automaticamente faz essa sequência unspeakable.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
